Package org.neo4j.storageengine.api

Interface MetadataProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, LogVersionRepository, StoreIdProvider, TransactionIdStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetaDataStore
    public interface MetadataProvider
extends TransactionIdStore, LogVersionRepository, StoreIdProvider, Closeable
    Provider for metadata that describes stores properties, ids, store level implementation details
